tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE quantum_metadata (
    experiment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    algorithm_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    researcher_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    experiment_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    experiment_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE quantum_algorithms (
    algorithm_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    algorithm_name TEXT,
    algorithm_description TEXT,
    created_by_user TEXT,
    created_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE experiment_metadata (
    experiment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    experiment_name TEXT,
    algorithm_id INT,
    experiment_description TEXT,
    experiment_start_time TIMESTAMP,
    PRIMARY KEY (experiment_id, algorithm_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (algorithm_id) REFERENCES quantum_algorithms (algorithm_id)
);

CREATE TABLE experiment (
  experiment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  experiment_name VARCHAR(255),
  researcher_name VARCHAR(255),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE algorithm_experiment (
  experiment_id INT,
  algorithm_id INT,
  execution_date DATE,
  result DECIMAL,
  FOREIGN KEY (experiment_id) REFERENCES experiment(experiment_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (algorithm_id) REFERENCES quantum_algorithm(algorithm_id)
);

CREATE TABLE algorithm_experiments (
	experiment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	algorithm_id INT,
	experiment_date DATE,
	result VARCHAR(100),
	FOREIGN KEY (algorithm_id) REFERENCES quantum_algorithms(algorithm_id)
);

CREATE TABLE experiment_files (
	file_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	experiment_id INT,
	file_name VARCHAR(100),
	file_type VARCHAR(20),
	file_size INT,
	FOREIGN KEY (experiment_id) REFERENCES algorithm_experiments(experiment_id)
);
